name: Break Them Up!
description:
Watch out, your crush is dating with your best friend! Now it's your time to shine!


You now only have one job; breaking them up! Follow the couple with simple controls, enter the gates and watch them break each other's heart!


Use only one finger to control your character. Every gate has its own purpose according to their colors. Collect hearts and see what happens! Use other throwable items too!


Your destiny is in your hands! Win your man and live happily ever after!
publishers: Rollic Games Oyun Yazilim ve Pazarlama Anonim Sirketi
